DP

Daily Push

From 0 to 100 Push‑Ups

Download
{/* Hero */}

Daily Push

From 0 to 100 push-ups — a progressive training program that builds strength step by step. Easy tracking and dark mode for late-night sessions.

  • ✓
    Progressive Training Program
    Customized difficulty that adapts to your level.
  • ✓
    Easy Tracking
    Log sets, rest times and progress in seconds.
  • ✓
    Dark Mode Available
    Comfortable for early mornings or late-night training.
Get the app See features
{/* Features */}

How it works

Set your level

Set your max push ups and we prepare set a progressive plan.

Follow daily sessions

Short, focused workouts that fit any schedule.

Track progress

See your reps, sets and improvements over time.

{/* Footer / CTA */}

Ready to start?

Download Daily Push and start your journey from 0 to 100 push-ups.
